channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Be a Part of the Incoming RPI Student Sendoff!
item.description: From 1PM to 3PM on Sunday, August 11 at Pat’s Barn in the Rensselaer Technology Park, come join the RPI Alumni Chapter of Hudson Mohawk to meet and welcome local first-year students from the Class of 2028! It’s a great way to enjoy food and refreshments while making connections, sharing stories, and networking with our newest class. The cost is $10 per person; all local current and incoming RPI students area are invited free of charge courtesy of the Hudson Mohawk Chapter alumni.
item.author: Community

item.title: “Leaders in Action” Conversation with Dr. Rick Carter Scheduled for July 12
item.description: Date: Friday, July 12, 2024 10:30 AM - 12:30 PM - During this session, host Professor Azita Hirsa will discuss the “evolution and rebirth of the semiconductor industry and leadership in a dynamic geopolitical environment” with Dr. Rick Carter, Senior Director at GlobalFoundries. Participants will also be able to ask questions about any relevant aspects of the topic. Refreshments will be provided.
item.author: Community

item.title: CCPD: MathWorks Info Session to be Held July 18
item.description: From 6:30PM to 7:30PM on Thursday, July 18, students are welcome to join the MathWorks team to learn about the company’s career paths and culture, as well as upcoming opportunities for Arch students seeking an Away experience. Also take a minute to review the Engineering Development Group Spring Co-Op opportunity posted in Handshake.
item.author: Students

item.title: Registration Now Open for Summer 2024 Undergraduate Research Fair
item.description: Date: Monday, June 24, 2024 - Wed , July 17, 2024 (all day) - Undergraduate students of all majors who are participating in summer research are encouraged to register by July 17 for the Summer 2024 Undergraduate Research Fair, which will be hosted by the School of Science and take place from 3:00PM to 5:00PM on Wednesday, July 31 in the CBIS Atrium. It’s a great opportunity to present your work to the faculty and your peers!
item.author: Students

item.title: NSF Engineering Directorate Visit to be Held July 18
item.description:
Date: Thursday, July 18, 2024 3:30 PM - 4:30 PM - Register to join Rensselaer’s Office for Research for a visit by Dr. Susan Margulies of the National Science Foundation, who leads the Engineering Directorate and manages its nearly $800 million budget. Dr. Margulies will present on NSF Engineering’s priorities and funding opportunities, followed by a Q&A session.
